QuestData.Title: Anvilmar the Hero
QuestData.Description: You don't want to waste your time talking to me right now, $glad:lass;. Thargas Anvilmar himself is just on the other side of these wagons.$B$BSurely you've heard of him? He fought to defend the Thandol Span from the Dark Iron alongside the King of Stormwind! He's one of the finest heroes of Ironforge.$B$BRight now though, he's in the thick of it! Go out there and let him know you're ready to help. Just keep a good distance, he swings wide.
QuestData.RewardText: Well met! If you've got a weapon on you, I'll take any help I can get clearing out these crazed fools!
